name: THE FACILITY (itch) (zayJax_)
description:
This game is about a little man putting little blocks to escape the little facility.

Stuck on a level? Glitched yourself out of existence? Press [R] to restart the level.

Game made by ZAYJAX_ (https://twitter.com/zayJax_)

Music made by Rolemusic (http://rolemusic.sawsquarenoise.com//)

Track used (https://freemusicarchive.org/search?quicksearch=step+to+space)
